setSslCafile()

setSslCafile(string $val) : self

Location of Certificate Authority file on local filesystem which should be used with the $ssl_verify_peer option to authenticate the identity of the remote peer.

Parameters

string $val

The CA file.

Returns

self

Tags

None found

setSslCapath()

setSslCapath(string $val) : self

If $ssl_cafile is not specified or if the certificate is not found there, this directory path is searched for a suitable certificate.

The path must be a correctly hashed certificate directory.

Parameters

string $val

The CA path.

Returns

self

Tags

None found

setSslLocalCert()

setSslLocalCert(string $val) : self

Path to local certificate file on filesystem. This must be a PEM encoded file which contains your certificate and private key. It can optionally contain the certificate chain of issuers.

Parameters

string $val

The local certificate file path.

Returns

self

Tags

None found

setSslPassphrase()

setSslPassphrase(string $val) : self

Passphrase with which the $ssl_local_cert file was encoded.

Parameters

string $val

The passphrase.

Returns

self
